data.eml:eml: Fossil ants of the genus Gesomyrmex Mayr (Hymenoptera, Formicidae) from the Eocene of Europe and remarks on the evolution of arboreal ant communities

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dlussky, Gennady M., Wappler, Torsten, Wedmann, Sonja (2009): Fossil ants of the genus Gesomyrmex Mayr (Hymenoptera, Formicidae) from the Eocene of Europe and remarks on the evolution of arboreal ant communities. Zootaxa 2031: 1-20, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.186261
